# Chandan Kumar Thakur (The WH2)

Nepal-based AI architect, web developer, and cybersecurity student at Herald College Kathmandu (University of Wolverhampton).

## About
Chandan Kumar Thakur, known as The WH2, develops real-world systems like AI-driven traffic solutions, custom AI platforms such as TalkGPT, and multiple web applications aimed at solving practical problems. He is an ISO certified Frontend Web Developer, a BSc (Hons) Cybersecurity student, and currently works in Research & Development (R&D) at NavaNexa Pvt. Ltd. (Kupondole, Kathmandu) on the N-Traffic Jam project. With a strong White Hat mindset, he prioritizes security, deployment, and impactâ€”turning ideas into live, scalable platforms that serve both innovation and national growth.


## Projects & Ecosystem
### Core Applications (Full-Stack & Apps)
- **WH2 Store (SMM Platform):** https://wh2store.netlify.app/ - Full-stack social media boosting platform with mobile app.
- **TalkGPT v2 (AI Platform):** https://talkgpt2.netlify.app/ - Botpress-powered advanced AI conversational platform.
- **TalkGPT App (Android):** https://www.webintoapp.com/download/apk/681111/app-release.apk - Native Android extension for mobile AI access.
- **3D Solar System:** https://exploresolarsystem.netlify.app/ - Interactive 3D learning platform with 3D elements.
- **WH2 Chat (E2E Encrypted):** https://wh2chat.netlify.app/ - Secure video/audio calling app via ConnectyCube.
- **Particle Controller (Hand Gesture):** https://particle-controller.netlify.app/ - 3D hand gesture controlled particle system.
- **WH2 Tube:** https://wh2tube.netlify.app/ - Ad-free YouTube alternative with premium free features.
- **Mero Note:** https://meronote.netlify.app/ - Cloud-synced secure notebook web app.
- **Milk Trace:** https://milk-trace.netlify.app/ - Dairy management and milk tracking application.

### Specialized Tools & Utilities
- **WH2 Knowledge Hub:** https://wh2hub.netlify.app/ - Platform for project hosting and knowledge sharing.
- **Room Expense Tracker:** https://roomexpense.netlify.app/ - Group expense management with TalkGPT integration.
- **WH2 Bill:** https://wh2-bill.netlify.app/ - Submeter electricity bill calculator for shared living.
- **Mero Money:** https://meromoney.netlify.app/ - Cloud-based money lending and borrowing tracker.
- **TS Convert:** https://tsconvert.netlify.app/ - High-precision Timestamp to Time converter utility.
- **WH2 Weather:** https://wh2-weather.netlify.app/ - MySQL backed weather app with offline support.

### Web & Entertainment
- **Today IPL:** https://todayipl.netlify.app/ - Real-time IPL tracking, live streaming, and interactive games.
- **3D Illusion Particles:** https://3dillusion.netlify.app/ - Immersive Three.js based visual experiment.
- **GGSRC Robotics:** https://ggsrc.netlify.app/ - Official web portal for GoldenGate Science & Robotics club.
- **WH2 Games:** https://wh2-game.netlify.app/ - Aggregated hub for retro and modern web games.
- **Hamro Chatting:** https://hamrochatting.netlify.app/ - Real-time chat application built with Firebase.
- **Hair Studio Demo:** https://npbarber.netlify.app/ - Frontend business showcase for barbershop growth.
- **Evolution Cars:** https://evolutions.netlify.app/ - Interactive vehicle branding and showcase platform.
- **Zackm Portfolio (Initial):** https://zackm.mystrikingly.com/ - First-ever drag-and-drop portfolio prototype.
- **Friend Circle (ST):** https://cont.mystrikingly.com/ - Student community and networking portal.


## Education
- **BSc (Hons) Cybersecurity:** Herald College Kathmandu (2025 - Present)
- **Higher Secondary:** Golden Gate Int'l College (2023 - 2025)
- **Secondary School:** Greenland H.S.E.B. School (SEE 2023)

## Skills
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Python, ReactJS, NodeJS, Docker, Git, Firebase, Supabase, PostgreSQL, MQTT, Canva.
